<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This read may be dependent on more than one write. This typically occurs</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// when a definition is the result of multiple writes where at least one</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The HW is forced to do some extra bookkeeping to track of all the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// dependent writes, and implement a merging scheme for the partial writes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="normal">  --DependentWrites;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="normal">    CyclesLeft = TotalCycles;</Highlight></CodeLine>
